con:parameter.con:name: $filter
con:parameter.con:value: FilterReleaseStatus eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq 'hana' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'
con:parameter.con:default: FilterReleaseStatus eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq 'hana' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

con:entry.value: FilterReleaseStatus eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq ${#TestCase#SearchTerm} and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

entry.value: startswith(Component,${#TestCase#ComponentFilter}) and Category eq ${#TestCase#CategoryFilter} and Priority eq ${#TestCase#PriorityFilter} and FilterReleaseStatus eq ${#TestCase#ReleaseStatusFilter} and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq ${#TestCase#SearchTerm} and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

ComponentExcl eq ${#TestCase#ComponentFilter} and FilterProductVersion eq ${#TestCase#ProductVersionFilter} and Category eq ${#TestCase#CategoryFilter1} and Priority eq ${#TestCase#PriorityFilter1} and FilterSoftwareComponent eq ${#TestCase#SoftwareComponentFilter} and FilterSoftwareComponentVersion eq ${#TestCase#SoftwareComponentVersionFilter} and FilterSupportPackage eq ${#TestCase#SupportPackageFilter} and FilterReleaseStatus eq ${#TestCase#ReleaseStatusFilter} and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterDocumentType eq ${#TestCase#DocumentTypeFilter} and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq ${#TestCase#SearchTerm} and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

con:testCase.name: InternalUser_Logon
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [] located at [/rm-cloud-web/]

con:testStep.name: copy saml data
con:testStep.con:description: Get the value of input element with the name "SAMLRequest" from the step "SAML2 AuthLauncher". Store it in SOAP UI's testCase saml_request property.

con:entry.value: FilterReleaseStatus eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq '${#TestCase#SearchTerm1}' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'
FilterReleaseStatus eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq '${#TestCase#SearchTerm2}' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

entry.value: startswith(Component,'${#TestCase#ComponentFilter}') and Category eq '${#TestCase#CategoryFilter}' and Priority eq '${#TestCase#PriorityFilter}' and FilterReleaseStatus eq '${#TestCase#ReleaseStatusFilter}' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq '${#TestCase#SearchTerm1}' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'

ComponentExcl eq '${#TestCase#ComponentFilter}' and FilterProductVersion eq '${#TestCase#ProductVersionFilter}' and Category eq '${#TestCase#CategoryFilter1}' and Priority eq '${#TestCase#PriorityFilter1}' and FilterSoftwareComponent eq '${#TestCase#SoftwareComponentFilter}' and FilterSoftwareComponentVersion eq '${#TestCase#SoftwareComponentVersionFilter}' and FilterSupportPackage eq '${#TestCase#SupportPackageFilter}' and FilterReleaseStatus eq '${#TestCase#ReleaseStatusFilter}' and FilterSecurityPatchDay eq 'NotRestricted' and FilterDocumentType eq '${#TestCase#DocumentTypeFilter}' and FilterKeywordsFuzzy eq '${#TestCase#SearchTerm1}' and FilterFuzzyThreshold eq '0.9'
